title: Pixel 3 lock up issues
content:
I simply cannot keep my new Pixel 3 unlocked. It is set up with "Smart Lock" to be open : "on body",  "trusted place" , and I tried "trusted device" but gave up on that option. No matter - I use the phone - set it down for maybe 10 seconds and I need to swipe my fingerprint to start using again - no matter where I am - even in my trusted place, on my body, near my device - one or all!

Maddening - especially as this is a brand new device.

Yes, I have reported to Google but doesn't change the frustration with this phone. Am I missing a not so obvious correction? Thank you.
